title: I knew GP was strong but holy shit.
body:
He can eat orange to escape the realm of death. 
That's a one strong Pirate {{champion:41}}

replies.body: An orange a day keeps death way.

{{champion:82}} : "Gangplank, 1v1 me!"
{{champion:41}} : (Eats an Orange)
https://i.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/001/483/348/bdd.jpg
They're not just oranges, they're *blood* oranges. {{champion:41}}
Wtf he can?

> [{quoted}](name=Kitsune Kawaii,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=8BjXgTt7,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-06-01T13:11:28.022+0000)
>
> Wtf he can?

Yeah lol 
Same for qss and, which is bigger wtf, Olaf ult. 
I think it's kind of bug with Olaf ult as Morde R isn't any form of cc.

That depends on how you define CC.  It very well can be.

Side Note: I think that may work interestingly well for Olaf thematically.  Someone could chime in on that.
He's not allowed to die in battle, but is cursed to die in bed of old age.
Well somebody should've told that to my Olaf coz he be dyin' in battle a lot

That actually makes me sad.

His Ult shouldn't be considered a CC effect, as it's currently a "Suppression".
Suppression is a CC effect, strongest CC outside of displacements.
The strongest after displacement and *death.* :) No CC is stronger than death.
there use to be a summoner that could deny death back in the days.
It didn't deny death - it just shortened it
Right, still had to travel all the way back from spawn.  That can be a pretty far displacement.
teleport Revive combo was fun...oh, the double kills occasionally in bottom lane!

> [{quoted}](name=Busty Demoness,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=8BjXgTt7,comment-id=0000000000010001,timestamp=2019-06-01T17:33:25.924+0000)
>
> Suppression is a CC effect, strongest CC outside of displacements.

strongest cc is old morde ult ; after that you have death then you have the usual cc  :D
You can't cleanse the death realm per say, but if you cleanse during his channel then it gets cancelled.

The funny part is that only the start up of Olaf's ult removes it, if you ult Olaf during it he's still trapped.

Olaf's ult is probably coded as a QSS with CC immunity after.
Welcome to Riot Spaghetti code.
He can get out of urgot ult while being reeled in death realm is ezpz

{{champion:82}} :YOU WILL SERVE ME IN DEATH
{{champion:41}} : no
{{champion:82}} : YOU CANT JUST SAY "NO" TO DEATH
{{champion:41}} : just did
{{champion:82}} : **starts bringing him to death realm**
{{champion:41}} : lol nope **eats orange**
{{champion:82}} : **is visibly confused **

Alright, I'm still more impressed with Olaf. Gangplank has to cleanse with an orange, an item that (for all we know) is magical in nature. Maybe Bilgewater has magical oranges. Olaf though?

Olaf shrugs off high-tech gadgets like Vi's gauntlets knocking him into the air.
Olaf laughs in the face of ancient magics like Lissandra's true-ice prison.
Olaf ignores the whims of void-beings like Malzahar's void-infused powers.
Olaf **looks at the literal incarnation of universal balance** and leaves him on read as Bard is trying to put him in stasis.

All because he's really, astronomically, overwhelming pissed. the fuck. OFF.

Olaf gets a galaxy-sized star thrown at him by fucking Aurelion Sol and all Aurelion sees is [Seen at 8:26 PM].
Had fun reading this...
What's in those oranges?

A nourishing source of Vitamin C to prevent the onset of scurvy, a common deficiency among pirates of earlier times

Yeah, I'm not fun at parties : )

Well it is one heck of a Vitamin C if it can even beat Vitamin CC
As you can see, I am not fun either :)

Vitamin CC

Lol
Ironic, considering you're more likely to get kidney stones from that over consumption of vitamin c these days than ward off scurvy.
Vitamin Sea
its a Devil Fruit lol
Harau Harau no mi
something that also just deatches a giant chem drill from you too, somehow...{{champion:6}}
It's not GP that's strong, it vitamin C.

> [{quoted}](name=Krofinn,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=8BjXgTt7,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-06-01T13:30:01.968+0000)
>
> It's not GP that's strong, it vitamin C.

Binding your W ability to your C key when playing GP: 200 IQ

Hasnt this been known since the burning tides event?

MF literally blew GP´s ship and shit to the high heavens with a giant barrage of exploding cannonfire, and he  survived it because he had loaded the hull of his ship with oranges. 

Oranges that upon the explosion flooded the bay with orange juice making GP survive drowning or bleeding to death despite lacerations, a solid concussion, third degree burns and a lost arm. 

He them swam back to shore from his burning wreckage in that condition, walked up and into town and found himself a good doctor to threaten into giving him free treatment and a prosthetic before having a meal and going to bed. 


Oranges man.
I am shocked that after surviving it he didn't just go to market to buy more oranges to heal himself to full hp and regrow his hand xd

He probably wanted the metal arm so he could punch things harder. 

A someone being mad about being  sneak attacked with a cannon barrage in a attempt to send someone to heaven along with their best ship&crew would make a person do that.
So that's how he lived.
eat oranges, be K
What happens if Morde casts his ult on Morgana that shielded herself? Does it fail or go through the shield?

> [{quoted}](name=FallingMeteor,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=8BjXgTt7,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2019-06-01T16:56:59.376+0000)
>
> What happens if Morde casts his ult on Morgana that shielded herself? Does it fail or go through the shield?

I saw in a RossBoomsocks video where he tried Morde support (lol).

Black shield blocks the ultimate from doing anything and it goes on cooldown for Morde.
A giant metal wraith sent me to the realm of death. But then I ate an orange and it was k.

{{champion:82}} 1v1 me bro!

{{champion:41}} I'll vitamin C ya l8r! Yaarrr!
of course, he also can gain vision back when Noct use his Darkness. I love GP and I was wondering if he could possible do that, now I'm glad.

> [{quoted}](name=PaRa77,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=8BjXgTt7,comment-id=000f,timestamp=2019-06-01T21:52:11.420+0000)
>
> of course, he also can gain vision back when Noct use his Darkness. I love GP and I was wondering if he could possible do that, now I'm glad.

Don't start celebrating just yet, might be a bug/oversight.
Then again, Yasuo's Wind Wall still blocks a lot of things that aren't projectiles and Sion's Q still has a much larger effect than its particles...

Okay, you can _probably_ start celebrating right now.
And I thought slapping my Skarner stinger away with the vitamins was bullshit
Death best CC... still it's a CC.
There are much better, easier champs but GP is fun GP is life.

i think morde's ult is coded as some sort of surpression, as only items or abilities can cleanse it + spell immunity deflects it, it doesnt have the CC tag tho so.. if you're cc immume, too bad... its... a weirdly coded thing
Can GP cleanse Camille ult?  Because I see Morde's new ult as a variant of that, not a variant of suppression......
